resources.string: PtgUpdater should receive data from PTelegram. Go back to partisan Telegram and continue with the installation there for now.

PtgUpdater received all data from PTelegram. Now you need to uninstall it in order to install the new version. Don\'t worry, all your data including accounts, secret chats, partisan settings, false passcodes will be transferred to the new version of the app.
The old version of PTelegram has been removed. Now you need to install PTelegram 3.0. Once installed, go back to PtgUpdater to transfer the data.
The new version of PTelegram is installed, but it is still empty. Let\'s fill it with data from the old version.
Telegram updated to version 3.0. PtgUpdater is no longer needed and can be removed.
